class_notes: JM students only. Per ABA rules, JD students cannot receive credit for online JM classes
course_description: In this course students will study the legal regulation of health care institutions and providers, including the regulation managing health care organizations and institutions (payment systems, health and safety, privacy, etc.), and the regulations managing health care providers (e.g. doctor and health care provider licensing).
sections: Class Nbr: 5177, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: T. Rogers, Status: Open
